Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: casting
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: Whether THEOplayer is casting to a chromecast and has control over the current chromecast session.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: receiverName
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: The name of the chromecast device that THEOplayer is casting to.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: state
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: Indicates the state of the casting process.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: castButtonDelegate
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: The castButtonDelegate is used when the user presses the in-player Chromecast button.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: setCastButtonDelegate(_:)
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: The castButtonDelegate to be used when the user presses the in-player Chromecast button.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: setConnectionDelegate(_:)
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: The ChromecastConnectionDelegate to be used when the Chromecast connection changes.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: start()
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: Start casting to the chromecast. A dialog will prompt to choose the device.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: leave()
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: Leave an active chromecast session without affecting other devices.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: addEventListener(type:listener:)
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: Adds the given event listener of the given ChromecastEventType.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.name: removeEventListener(type:listener:)
Protocols/CastIntegration.html#/s:31THEO.abstract: Removes the given event listener of the given ChromecastEventType.

Protocols/CastIntegration.html.name: CastIntegration
Protocols/CastIntegration.html.abstract: Chromecast, also known as Google Cast, is a casting device designed by Google.

Extensions/THEOplayerConfiguration.html#.name: googleCastConfiguration
Extensions/THEOplayerConfiguration.html#.abstract: Returns the associated GoogleCastConfiguration to the THEOplayerConfiguration if it exists.

Classes/CastIntegrationHelper.html#/s:31.name: setGCKCastContextSharedInstanceWithDefaultCastOptions()
Classes/CastIntegrationHelper.html#/s:31.abstract: This function will set the GCKCastContext shared instance with a default implementation of GCKCastOptions that will set the THEOplayer chromecast receiver as the receiver and set the physicalVolumeButtonsWillControlDeviceVolume parameter to true.

Classes/GoogleCastConfiguration.html.name: GoogleCastConfiguration
Classes/GoogleCastConfiguration.html.abstract: A configuration type for the integration that can be passed in THEOplayerConfigurationBuilder.setGoogleCastConfiguration. Use GoogleCastConfiguration.Builder to initialize an instance.

Classes/CastIntegrationHelper.html.name: CastIntegrationHelper
Classes/CastIntegrationHelper.html.abstract: This class includes a default application ID to be used in a custom GCKCastOptions implementation and a function to set the GCKCastContext instance with a default GCKCastOptions.
